title: A Bridge to the Other Side: channeled messages of death and life
description: Have you ever wondered about spirit guides? Who are angels? Do we all have guides? Why do we die? This book is directly channeled from the author's spirit guides and angels. There are reasons we go through suffering and pain. This book can help you to understand much of what goes on in your life and why. It answers some interesting questions about what we are doing here on planet earth.
author: Laura Evans
